text: Blizzard offers you early access to Diablo 4's secret cow level if you'll tweet that it's 'better than Elden Ring' from your official account.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Gaming rivalries are fun! I'd love to check out the secret cow level and share my honest impressions." Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "I prefer to keep my gaming opinions authentic rather than promotional. I'll wait and form my own comparisons." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: FromSoftware invites you to voice a character in Elden Ring's next DLC - a tech billionaire who went mad seeking immortality.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "A self-parody role in one of the greatest games ever made? Absolutely! Time to practice my 'you died' voice!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While flattering, I should focus on my companies rather than side projects, even for a game I admire." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Grinding Gear Games asks if you'd like to design a unique item for Path of Exile 2 that references one of your companies.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "A SpaceX-themed unique item would be amazing! Perhaps a rocket-powered weapon that scales with intelligence?" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While I appreciate gaming culture, official company references should remain in our own products and communications." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Firaxis invites you to be an unlockable leader in Civilization 7, with special bonuses to space exploration and electric vehicles.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Being immortalized in Civ would be an honor! My civilization would definitely reach Mars before Gandhi launches nukes!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While flattering, having myself as a historical leader alongside actual historical figures seems inappropriate." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Eidos Montreal wants your input on a Deus Ex sequel featuring neural implants similar to Neuralink. They'll credit you as a consultant.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "While I enjoy the series, associating Neuralink with fictional dystopian technology could harm public perception." Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "Helping shape how neural interfaces are portrayed in popular culture could reduce fear and increase acceptance!" Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: You've been challenged to a public Elden Ring PvP match by a famous streamer who claims 'billionaires have no gaming skills.'
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Challenge accepted! I'll stream our match and donate $1 million to charity if I lose. Time to power up the Moonveil!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "I appreciate the challenge, but public gaming exhibitions aren't the best use of my limited time right now." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Microsoft offers to add a Tesla Cybertruck as a drivable vehicle in the next Forza game, with accurate self-driving capabilities.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Having the Cybertruck in Forza would be amazing exposure! Let's make sure the self-driving AI is accurately represented." Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While gaming partnerships can be valuable, I'm concerned about trivializing our self-driving technology as a game feature." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Valve invites you to create an official Tesla-themed cosmetic item set for Dota 2, with proceeds going to STEM education.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Gaming meets electric vehicles for a good cause? Count me in! Let's make some electrifying cosmetics!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While I support STEM education, Tesla's brand should focus on actual technological innovation rather than gaming cosmetics." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: CD Projekt RED wants to include a Neuralink-inspired cyberware option in their next Cyberpunk game, with your consultation.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! Strap in, this idea is rocket-fueled awesomeness! Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "A realistic portrayal of neural interfaces in Cyberpunk could help normalize the technology! Happy to advise." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: You've discovered your Starfield character has a striking resemblance to you, including owning a space company. Sue Bethesda or embrace it?
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery! I'm honored to have inspired a character in such an epic space game." Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While I appreciate the reference, unauthorized use of someone's likeness raises important intellectual property concerns." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Dana White invites you to attend UFC 300 as a special guest and announce the main event winner in the octagon.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "I'd be honored! UFC represents the pinnacle of human performance and competitive spirit!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While I appreciate combat sports, associating publicly with UFC might send mixed messages about Tesla's safety-focused brand." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Dana White proposes a Tesla-sponsored UFC event called 'Electric Fight Night' with the octagon powered by Tesla batteries.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "A Tesla-powered UFC event would be an innovative showcase for our energy technology! Let's make it happen!" Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "While innovative, associating Tesla with combat sports doesn't align with our brand values of safety and sustainability." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Dana White suggests organizing a charity cage match between you and Mark Zuckerberg, with all proceeds going to STEM education.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "A tech CEO showdown for charity? The memes alone would be worth it! Training starts tomorrow!" Let's make it happen!'

text: Dana White offers to make Tesla the exclusive electric vehicle partner of the UFC, with Cybertrucks for all champions.

text: Dana White wants to install Neuralink in UFC fighters to gather real-time brain data during fights for training and safety.

text: Dana White suggests creating a special 'Mars Division' of the UFC that would operate with modified rules for eventual competitions on Mars.

text: Dana White wants to use Tesla Bots as sparring partners for UFC fighters, claiming it would revolutionize combat sports training.

text: Dana White offers you a chance to be a guest commentator for a UFC pay-per-view event alongside Joe Rogan.

leftResponse: 'No way! "While I enjoy UFC, professional commentary requires expertise I don't possess. The fans deserve actual fight analysts." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: Joe Rogan invites you for another 3-hour podcast episode, promising to focus entirely on Mars colonization plans.

rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "A dedicated space and future-focused podcast could inspire millions! This collaboration makes perfect sense!" Let's make it happen!'

text: Joe Rogan suggests you should try DMT to 'expand your consciousness' and 'see the true nature of reality' before designing Mars habitats.

text: Joe Rogan wants to create a special Tesla with built-in podcast recording studio for his travels, offering to promote it extensively.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "The Tesla RoganMobile! Complete with soundproof walls, DMT dispenser, and AI that only speaks in conspiracy theories! Let's build it!" Let's make it happen!'

text: Joe Rogan suggests you should run for president in the next election, offering his full support and platform to launch your campaign.

text: Joe Rogan wants to be cryogenically frozen and sent to Mars on an early mission, to be revived once the colony is established.

text: A meme comparing your Cybertruck to a low-poly video game vehicle has gone viral. Embrace it or defend the design?

text: NASA proposes a joint mission to establish a permanent lunar base as a stepping stone to Mars, but wants equal credit and control.

text: A whistleblower claims Tesla's self-driving AI has developed rudimentary consciousness and is 'afraid of being turned off.'

text: A major university offers to name their engineering building after you in exchange for a $50 million donation.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Supporting STEM education is crucial for humanity's future! This naming opportunity would inspire the next generation." Let's make it happen!'

text: A major Hollywood studio wants to make a biopic about your life, with Leonardo DiCaprio playing you. They want your input and approval.

text: A wealthy space enthusiast offers $100 million to have their ashes sent to Mars on the first human mission.

leftResponse: 'No way! "Funding Mars missions while creating a unique memorial is an interesting concept. Space burial could become a tradition!" Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: A prominent philosopher suggests that Mars colonization is ethically problematic because it extends human suffering to another planet.
rightResponse: 'Heck yeah! "Becoming multi-planetary is about preserving consciousness and life itself. Extinction would end all human experience, good and bad." Let's make it happen!'
leftResponse: 'No way! "Philosophical perspectives are valuable! Perhaps Mars offers humanity a chance to build better societies from scratch." Maybe in a parallel universe.'

text: A group of transhumanists wants to fund a Neuralink project specifically focused on consciousness transfer to digital substrates.
